results.title: Maintaining classroom discipline
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Teacher Education”.
Provides the fundamentals for the proper control of class conduct and attitude. Contrasting methods of handling a class are shown.

results.title: Dog watch
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Tales of Pluto”.
Pluto, the faithful sea dog, is given responsibility of looking after the ship while the crew goes on shore leave. All goes well until a very crafty, very hungry, wharf rat sneaks on board.
results.description:

results.title: Wonder Dog
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Tales of Pluto”.
Pluto tries to impress his girlfriend by impersonating a circus dog. The feats he must perform, however, prove to be much trickier than he expected.

results.title: Sam Weller and his father
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Tales from Charles Dickens”.
Shows Sam Weller and his father collaborating on a plan to get Mr Pickwick out of the debtor’s prions and finally managing to give the detestable Mr Stiggins, a lay preacher, a sharp lesson. From the series “Tales from Dickens.”
results.description:

results.title: The Runaways
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Tales from Charles Dickens”.
A tale of childhood romance about the 9-year-old Harry Walmers and his fiance, both guests at the Holly Tree Inn, who elope with the help fo the hostess, Mrs Piff, Boots and the other servants. Introductor narration filmed in Dickens’ home.

results.title: Pluto's surprise package
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Tales of Pluto”.
A Disney animation film about a surprise package for Pluto. On opening the package, Pluto discovers that it contains a lovable irrepressible tortoise.
